---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
rev_2007 <- read.csv("revenue_2007_2009.csv", colClasses = c("year"="character"))
rev_2010 <- read.csv("revenue_2010_2020.csv", colClasses = c("year"="character"))
```

```{r}
rev_2007$year <- as.Date(paste(rev_2007$year, "/01", sep=""), format="%Y/%m/%d")
rev_2007$year<- format(rev_2007$year, "%Y")
```

```{r}
rev_2007 <- rev_2007 %>% rename(class_of_revenue=Class.of.revenue)
merged <- rbind(rev_2007, rev_2010)
merged$year <- sapply(merged$year, as.numeric)
```

```{r}
write.csv(merged, "revenue_2007_2020.csv")
```
